name: Chain of Shadows
flavorText: “Some theorized that hunters like Kunai harnessed the power of shadows to accomplish feats beyond the ken of mere mortals. Preposterous.”- Abd al-Hazir
flavorTextHtml: “Some theorized that hunters like Kunai harnessed the power of shadows to accomplish feats beyond the ken of mere mortals. Preposterous.”- Abd al-Hazir

secondary.textHtml: After using Impale, Vault costs no resource for 2 seconds. (Demon Hunter Only)
